name: Wall Break
description:
You use a square to bounce a ball to destroy a wall. With this ball you get powerups, ammo, time, defense or control. If you lose every ball, you lose. But if you destroy the enough objects in the screen, or the wall, you can get a new ball, but for each ball you get, it will be more difficult, like the wall. Check if you can survive and destroy every wall to reach your objective, that is... destroy every wall.

Controls

[Joystick(XBOX360)]

Pause: Start

Player movement: Left Stick

Fast movement: X

Slow movement: A

Shot Laser: Right Trigger

Slow time: Left Trigger

Hold ball: R Button

Activate Barrier: L Button

[Keyboard]

Pause: Intro

Player movement: wasd / Arrows

Fast movement: K / Z

Slow movement: L / X

Shot Laser: Space

Slow time: N / Ctrl

Hold ball: J / Left Shift

Activate Barrier: E / C
